content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, close to all important facilities. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm expecting a substantial amount for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds good, but I am still a student and I don't have a lot of money. So, I am looking for the lowest price possible. Can you offer me a discount?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but I value my tenants equally, and I cannot provide discounts. I'm willing to negotiate, but the price will not be significantly low, considering the prime location of the apartment. I'm expecting a substantial amount for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month for the apartment. I hope this is a good starting point for negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang. However, 700 Euros per month is not nearly substantial enough for such a prime location. I'm sure we can agree on a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How about 750 Euros per month? This is the highest I can pay.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but 750 Euros per month is still not enough. I'm sure we can agree on a higher price. After all, the apartment is of prime location and is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is of good quality, but I am still a student. I cannot afford to pay more than 780 Euros per month. This is the highest I can pay.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, Mr. Wang. However, 780 Euros per month is still not enough for such a prime location. I'm sure we can agree on a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already increased my offer as high as I can. I hope you can understand my situation as a student.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Mr. Wang. However, I must prioritize the overall value of my property. I appreciate your time and interest in the apartment. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
